root.name: Super Back to the Future II
root.description: OverviewSuper Back to the Future II is a 2D platformer based off the blockbuster movie, Back to the Future II. The game was developed by Daft and published by Toshiba-EMI for the Super Famicom in Japan on July 23, 1993. Strangely enough Super Back to the Future II was never released outside of Japan but an unofficial English translation patch was created by Polish ROM hacking group mteam on January 13, 2012.
